Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created 31.07.2001
10.07.2013 SH SCR18237 BPH242B Added BPH104.PI.IBANDEBTOR and BPH104.PI.SWIFTDEBTOR
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
09.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Added BPH104.PI.BANK_ADMNO = CHQU_BANK_ADMNO
03.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
29.04.2011 GB SCR16371 Eliminate GNRL_LANGUAGE
14.12.2010 SH SCR16057 BPH242A Added BPH102.PI.TYPEOFDRAFTS = 0
17.08.2010 SH SCR15725 BPH242B/D Added BPH104.PO.SFIP_NO
and call of BSF106
27.07.2010 SH SCR15678 BPH242A Added BPH102.PI.RCVDFROMCLIENT = 0
07.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
25.08.2009 SH SCR14729 Added BPH104.PI.TESTBANKACCOUNT=N
16.07.2009 SH SCR14735 Added GB007 to fetch message 'PH1016' instead from MESG
25.02.2008 SH SCR13425 BPH242A Added BMQ001 to store MQ200
02.01.2008 GB SCR13253 Updated CHQU_USERID = blank
05.11.2007 SH SCR13034 BPH242B Added BPH104.PI.WKAACCOUNT = N
21.12.2005 SH SCR9866 BPH242A/B/C/D Removed tests on CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL
and CHQE_LEGALCOLLECTION
07.11.2005 SH SCR9415 BPH242A/B Added new field CHQE_LEGALCOLLECTION, uses
to extend conditions to perform BPH242A/B
31.10.2005 SH SCR8929 BPH242A Fixed bug for CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL handling
25.08.2005 SH SCR8929 BPH242A Extended test to perform module with
"... or CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = Y"; BPH242B - D extended test to perform modules
with "... and or CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = N"
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments to list for BPH102, both skipped
13.07.2005 SH SCR8473 BPH242B/D Added new arguments for BPH104 and BPH106
12.07.2005 SH SCR8544 BPH242F Added new arguments to call of BPH112
10.03.2005 SH SCR7917 Extended test to skip further cheque handling with
GSET_YESNO = 'N' (where GSET_ID = 79)
- BPH242A Uses new CHQE amount fields in module
- BPH242C Uses new CHQE amount fields in module
- BPH242D Uses new CHQE amount fields in module
- BPH244 Changed update of TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITC with sum(CHQE_AMOUNTACCCURR)
where the first TMPL row is stored, also TMPL_CURRENCY = BANK_CURRENCY now
11.11.2004 SH SCR7324 Changed program structure, that CHQU_RUNNUMBER will
be stored immed to DB, see SCR for details
28.09.2004 SH SCR7089 Added new argument for BPH102 -> PI.BADP_ID = 0
05.04.2004 SH SCR5891 BPH242 Calc PI.CLIENTVALUEDATE for BPH102 with BPH126 now
13.01.2004 SH SCR5190 BPH242A Calc v.JOURNALNO for every distinct client, update
CHQE_REPA_JOURNALNO with v.JOURNALNO and use virtual now as argument
for PI.JOURNALNO (BPH102)
13.01.2004 SH SCR5139 BPH242A Fixed bug with recalculation PO.AMOUNTBANKCOSTS;
- BPH109 will be only called if CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = 'Y', now.
18.12.2003 SH SCR5070 Added new field TMPL_BOOKINGDATE, init = CHQU_UNITDATE
07.10.2003 SH SCR4440 Changed transaction from Record Prefix to Group on Client
- in task "Tests at CHEQUE level"
02.07.2003 SH SCR3912 Added new argument for BPH109 (Cheques ='C')
15.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Added new parameter for call BPH105
12.05.2003 SH SCR3525 Stop program if CHQU_FOREIGNCHEQUES = TRUE and
- CHQU_CURRENCY <>GNRL_CURRENCY; BPH242A calculate bankcosts
- with BPH109 and store with BPH102 if CHQU_FOREIGNCHEQUES = TRUE and
- CHQU_CURRENCY = GNRL_CURRENCY
09.05.2003 SH SCR3369 Stop program if CHQU_FOREIGNCHEQUES = TRUE
- without any updates
24.03.2003 SCR3167 BPH242A Call BPH102 once per Client with the cumulated
- CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE
18.02.2003 addtional inits TMPL
04.12.2002 SCR2650 SHAdd new argument to list for call BPH102 PI.NUMPAYMENTS = 1
05.11.2002 SCR2465 SH Reset some virtuals for every cheque which used to book
- the cheques automatically
14.10.2002 SH Add 5 new arguments to call of BPH105, all skipped at the moment
24.09.2002 SH BPH242A Add tree new arguments for call of BPH102 at the end
- of the list all = 0
19.09.2002 SH BPH242A Add tree new arguments for call of BPH102 at the end
- of the list (11. argument = CHQE_ID) the two others = 0
18.09.2002 SCR2214 SH BPH244A The CHQU_TOTAUNIT with will be written to
- TMPL_LEDGERDSCRIPTION was not formated into 'N11.2C', old 'N11,2'
17.09.2002 SCR2200 SH Diff. changes of storing TMPL rows
04.09.2002 SH BPH242A add new argument for call to BPH102
- last argument (PI.JOURNALNO) = 0
03.09.2077 SH Changed parameter from numeric in alphanumeric because
- BPH240 will be called now from #GB701. In T.R. the new parameter will be
- converted into numeric --> v.BATCH_ID converted numeric
30.07.2002 SH Call BPH237 (Delete TMPJ row) from T.S. now, before it was in R.S.
in BPH244, because the table was already open for update.
05.06.2002 SH Remove DEBUGGER
21.05.2002 SH SCR1289 TEMP_JOBSTATUS mus be updated to force the creation of new
- BATCHES if CHQE_ADMNO/CHQE_CLNTNO changed, add therefore a groupbreake in
- task "Test at CHEQUE level"
21.03.2002 SH Call BPH250 as submitjob, use #GB701
07.03.2002 JJ SCR957 Implemented new fields TMPL
18.02.2002 JJ SCR841 Implemented new field TMPL_JOURNALID
21.02.2002 SH SCR839 (Fixed problems with automatic booking and final updates)
26.02.2002 SH SCR922 (BPH244D --> CHQU:BATCHCREATED was not set to 'Y')
27.02.2002 SH SCR929 (Store second TMPL row only if TMPJ_AMOUNTBATCHES <>0)
-- Uses for BPH242A
// CHQU row does not exist; error PH1016
// else programs, not always for foreign cheques
-- Perform only if the cheque unit exists
-- If first run, no runnumber exists, create one and store to CHQU and TMPJ to
enable BPH240 for restarts
sort on CHQE_ADMNO and CHQE_CLNTNO
// If change in ADMNO or CLNTNO then TMPJ_BTCH_ID_MANUAL = 0
// to force the creation of a new BATCH
-- Reset virtuals per client
-- BPH242A Get v.JOURANLNO, only once per distinct client
-- BPH242A - Handle intercredit
-- Calculate bankcosts
-- Calculate client value date
-- Call BPH102 for eyery intercredit client
-- Report exchange differences (MQ200)
// First reset some virtuals for every cheque
// BPH 242 A Handle intercredit
-- Automatic payment handling
.. if not intercredit
then BPH 242 B - D
// BPH 242 B Automatic payment handling
// BPH 242 C Store manual payment
// BPH 242 D Automatic payment handling
// BPH 243 Final update at CHEQUE level
// BPH 244 D Delete TEMP_JOBSTATUS row
// 244 A Store TMPL row
-- Store a second TMPL row if TMPJ_AMOUNTBATCHES <> 0
// BPH 244 B Store LEDGER_CHANGES_DETAIL/HEADER/CLIENT
// BPH 244 C Start program to handle the automatic batches
-- Submit Serverjob for BPH250
-- The second TMPL row is only created if TMPJ_AMOUNTBATCHES > 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(CHQE_AMOUNTCURRACC) as decimal (18,2)) from :1 where CHQE_CHQU_ID = :2 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
